short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rose Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Roses background. Rose wallpaper background themes for flower fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Rose wallpapers every time you open a new tab.  
2. Randomize Rose backgrounds or favorite specific ones through the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Custom search bar with results from your preferred search engine.  
4. Quick links for easy access to your emails and social media accounts.  
5. Automatically display the current date and time.  
6. A "New Note" feature to jot down tasks or reminders.  
7. Convenient access to your most visited websites.  
8. Easy navigation to your bookmarks.  
9. Add custom websites to a Shortcut panel for quick access.  
10. Instant access to Google apps.  
11. Explore and apply more themes effortlessly.  
12. Share content quickly to social media platforms.  
13. Download wallpapers with a single click.  
14. Quick access to play games.  
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in your Rose new tab.
